div.a: New icons set for an iOS app

td.div: A collection of textile samples lay spread out on the table..

div.p:
Did you know Help Scout can also keep track of voicemails and phone calls? Check out the Voicemail App for a list of supported voicemail providers.
You can log a new phone call by creating a new conversation and selecting the phone icon as the type. Anything you log as a phone call is added as a note to the conversation.

Did you know Help Scout can also keep track of voicemails and phone calls? Check out the Voicemail App for a list of supported voicemail providers.
You can log a new phone call by creating a new conversation and selecting the phone icon as the type. Anything you log as a phone call is added as a note to the conversation.
